My new bill will prohibit oil and gas leasing on public lands that are determined by @BLMNational to have low or no potential for development. Read more here ➡️  https://bit.ly/2R1B8K3

Speculative oil and gas leasing on low-potential lands wastes BLM resources and “locks up” precious areas that could be more effectively used for wildlife preservation, recreation, grazing or renewable energy development. I’m proud to introduce a bill to change that.

We just started a new year & I couldn’t be prouder of all of the progress we’ve made together. Last year, I worked on issues that matter most to Nevadans, from housing to health care, to creating good-paying jobs & investing in renewable energy & economic development.
